content:
- 'Description': Provides information and guidelines on creating a secure
    and complex password.
  'Id': bd08e5dec4a04647ad750b5e034f98d5
  'Name': Password Complexity
  'Slot':
  - 'Description': The minimum length of the password.
    'Identifier': 1b8282be20924b73adb2041ffadb2edb
    'Name': minimum_length
  - 'Description': The maximum length of the password.
    'Identifier': 8e4ea1597f6c45da8c334143d8b9a835
    'Name': maximum_length
  - 'Description': The types of characters that must be included in the password.
    'Identifier': 153f8cc810e9417e9bbd567afaf8cef5
    'Name': required_characters
    'Example values':
    - lowercase
    - uppercase
    - digits
    - special_characters
  - 'Description': The types of characters that are not allowed in the password.
    'Identifier': d06600d691114397a1db84bb76ab52c7
    'Name': prohibited_characters
- 'Description': Discusses best practices for keeping a password secure and
    protected.
  'Id': 39290309dcde4ebeb6674a9c1fe60967
  'Name': Password Security
  'Slot':
  - 'Description': The level of strength for a password.
    'Identifier': 200501e7447a4e498a48e27950ec2c5a
    'Name': password_strength
    'Example values':
    - weak
    - moderate
    - strong
  - 'Description': The minimum number of characters required for a password.
    'Identifier': 7993be0e190b4df59396c231bb4cf415
    'Name': password_length
  - 'Description': The complexity of characters required for a password.
    'Identifier': 54400e2b20434f878ea4f9702474672c
    'Name': password_complexity
  - 'Description': The number of previous passwords that cannot be reused.
    'Identifier': 46df8e27d39c4ff48a107d755351846c
    'Name': password_history
    'Example values':
    - '5'
    - '10'
    - '15'
- 'Description': Allows the user to reset their forgotten password.
  'Id': a6fd0bd3d5c445dabc161f5e51292c0a
  'Name': Reset Password
  'Slot':
  - 'Description': The type of user account for which the password is being
      reset.
    'Identifier': ee56b13c5d1c4760aef8ef3bdb59ab60
    'Name': user_type
  - 'Description': The username or email associated with the account for which
      the password is being reset.
    'Identifier': f883a4facc9f45819cb2cd057aa9b8b6
    'Name': username
  - 'Description': The new password that the user will use to log in.
    'Identifier': 03fc06cd898d440191e84b38506b3327
    'Name': new_password
    'Example values':
    - <any valid password string>
  - 'Description': The security question associated with the account.
    'Identifier': 58c8727d066147c3947d7977ef6b7662
    'Name': security_question
  - 'Description': The answer to the security question.
    'Identifier': 216010569cfb4a6e9c634a0428d9dc39
    'Name': security_answer
